Developing Research Questions and Creating Keywords

Created by Renee Romero, Shannon Roux, Taylor Harper, Kian Ravaei, Doug Worsham

Affiliated with UCLA?

If you are affiliated with UCLA and would like to receive certification of completion for this workshop, be sure to Log in and Enroll in WI+RE's CCLE site before completing this workshop.

Not affiliated with UCLA?

No problem! All of our workshops and activities are open access and freely available to all! Enjoy the activities!

About this workshop

Awards and Recognition

This workshop has received a 5-star editor review on MERLOT, a curated collection of online learning and support materials.

Authors

Renee Romero, Shannon Roux, Taylor Harper, Kian Ravaei, Doug Worsham

Contributors

Emily Appleton

Learning Outcomes

  • Develop specific research questions from a topic
  • Turn questions into keywords
  • Construct a preliminary search for your specific research question

Accessibility Information

  • Closed Captioning Available
  • WAVE tested - 0 errors - Jul 21, 2020
  • Issue filed for one accessibility improvement - headers - Jul 21, 2020
